subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Government Bonds
Football
Colleges and Universities
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Rutgers officials approved a plan Friday to authorize $30 million in new bonds that would finance the expansion of the university’s football stadium.
snippet: Rutgers officials approved a plan Friday to authorize $30 million in new bonds that would finance the expansion of the university’s football stadium.
